reviews.text: Stayed there one night while traveling through area. Was disappointed to see the room up close. Was given a handicapped room, which was fine except the roll in shower was full of mildew on the floor and walls of shower. The shower wand had leaks all along the hose and sprayed paper all over the bathroom. The windows in two of the rooms had aleast 1/4 inch gaps around them where the wind and dust freely came in. There was a recliner in the room which was nice for relaxing in after a day of driving.
reviews.title: Mildewed shower

reviews.text: I have been happy with the Days Inn in Childress. I have stayed at four different hotels in Childress since 1995. Over the years the Comfort Inn and the Holiday Inn have gone downhill. At this time, Days Inn is my choice. It is well-lit, acceptably clean, and well-maintained. The front desk people have always been pleasant.
reviews.title: Consider staying at the Days Inn
